title: Hookah, ca. 1820
provenance: Cecil Davis, Ltd., London; 1970 P. Warren
description: Inverted urn shape with short faceted neck with squared rim at lip, pris- matic cutting on shoulder, band of diamonds, wide fluting and prismatic bands to wide flaring base cut with narrow flutes at rim, bottom cut wit star.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hookah, ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-222.
